file_content.text: General Var Suthra, I've shut down the cruiser's reactors. I repeat, the battle cruiser is under my control.
Understood. I'll send troops to secure the vessel and hold it for the Republic.
The day is ours, my friend. Meet me back at base. Var Suthra out....
The fighting down here is bad. I may not be able to--
Do you really think you've won? You only prolong the galaxy's suffering.
In the end, no one is saved. This battle will be fought forever. Nothing I do matters.
You'd never faced failure--until you met the Emperor. That's what broke you.
I finally understand you.
I was certain the light would triumph over dark, but he's more than dark. He's a void.
Every choice matters. You chose to become Sith, and people suffered because of it.
Then why do you serve evil?
I wanted it all to end. No Sith, no Jedi. No war.
You tried to murder billions of innocent people because the Emperor wounded your ego.
You're pathetic.
He destroyed my will with a thought. And I am strong in the Force--but it wasn't enough.
You've stopped his plans for now, but the Emperor is patient. He will try again and again, until he wins.
That guy really needs a new hobby--like fishing, or being dead.
He could wait until we're dead before he tries again. What if no one's around to stop him?
It's true. We will never be safe until he's dead.
Not if we put a blaster bolt between his eyes.
The Emperor is on Dromund Kaas. Go to him. You will see how pointless our struggles have been.
Everything I do leads me back to the Emperor. There's no retreat from that.
I'll go to meet my fate.
Beware of destinies. They're rarely what you expect.
The Imperial capitol is a big planet. Where exactly will I find the Emperor?
Where on Dromund Kaas?
Why would I accept such an offer from a man who just tried to kill me?
Sounds like a trap.
Face him, or don't. It doesn't matter.
I will give you the Emperor's coordinates. Even in his weakened state, you are no match for him.
I tire of this horrible existence. My life has been a failure. End it.
Let go of your past, Master Braga. If you hate what you are, become someone better.
Start your life over.
I know you still care about this galaxy. Do something to make it a worthy place.
Go to Tython. Rejoin the Jedi Order. It needs you.
You're so confident. I remember that feeling. The sense of purpose. Was it only a dream?
Perhaps it's not too late. Maybe you can defeat him and save us all.
I'll go to Tython. I'll... hope. May the Force be with you.
Some failures are beyond redemption. Goodbye, Master Braga.
As you wish. [Kill him]
You Jedi aren't so good with forgiving, are you?
I feel sick. I want this whole thing to be over with.
Good riddance. I hope the Emperor felt that.
Live like a coward, die like one.
You will use the Emperor's power to hunt down the Sith. You will become my assassin.
[Force Persuade] Go kill Sith.
I will use the Emperor's power to hunt down the Sith. I will become your assassin.
I feel... reborn. I have a purpose.
Whoa, really? Uh, I mean, great. Just keep that hocus-pocus away from me....
You can't do this. It's wrong!
You will forget this moment. You will serve me faithfully.
I... I will forget this moment. I will serve you faithfully.
Impressive. You're learning, Jedi.
Good idea. He won't last long, but maybe long enough.
No you won't, my little friend.
You suffered some memory damage, Teeseven--but I stopped it. You're going to be alright.
Here... take this. You'll need every advantage when you face the Emperor. I'm going. May the Force be with you.
Jedi + T7 = find Sith Emperor + stop him forever
Killing Master Braga = irresolvable logic error // Jedi decision process = unknown
Assassination = against Jedi Code // T7 = inform Master Satele
T7 = relieved // Jedi = best friend
